titleStmt.title: The vertuous wife: or, the holy life of Mrs. Elizabth Walker, late wife of A. Walker, D.D. sometime Rector of Fyfield in Essex Giving a modest and short account of her exemplary piety and charity. Published for the glory of God, and provoking others to the like graces and vertues. With some useful papers and letters writ by her on several occasions.
titleStmt.author: Walker, Anthony, d. 1692.
Walker, Elizabeth, 1623-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for N. R. and sold by J. Robinson, A. and J. Churchill, J. Taylor, and J. Wyat,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Anthony Walker by Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.
